feed.title: Google Cloud: Vertex AI Workbench
feed.subtitle: Changelog for Google Cloud product: Vertex AI Workbench

entry.title: Feature
entry.content:
**M131 release**
The M131 release of Vertex AI Workbench instances includes the following:
* Updated the Dataproc JupyterLab plugin to version 0.1.89.

entry.title: Feature
entry.content:
**M130 release**
The M130 release of Vertex AI Workbench instances includes the following:
* Updated the Dataproc JupyterLab plugin to version 0.1.87. * Added the BigQuery JupyterLab plugin, version 0.0.1. * The `GOOGLE_CLOUD_REGION` environment variable is now set by default.

entry.title: Feature
entry.content: Available in [Preview](https://cloud.google.com/products#product-launch-stages): You can consume reservations with Vertex AI Workbench instances. Reservations of Compute Engine zonal resources help you gain a high level of assurance that your jobs have the necessary resources to run. For more information, see [Use reservations with Vertex AI Workbench instances](https://cloud.google.com/vertex-ai/docs/workbench/instances/reservations).
